metadata.title: CVE-2022-32212 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A OS Command Injection vulnerability exists in Node.js versions <14.20.0, <16.20.0, <18.5.0 due to an insufficient IsAllowedHost check that can easily be bypassed because IsIPAddress does not properly check if an IP address is invalid before making DBS requests allowing rebinding attacks.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
